articles.description: Jude Bellingham pulled Gareth Southgate's side clear of the precipice with one of the finest goals scored by anyone in an England shirt, writes Phil McNulty.
articles.title: Jude Bellingham: 'Iconic Euro 2024 goal will go down in England history'

articles.description: Live text commentary as Spain play Georgia in Euro 2024 last 16, with Germany awaiting winners.
articles.title: Spain vs Georgia LIVE: Euro 2024 football score, commentary, line-ups & updates

articles.description: Lando Norris accuses Max Verstappen, his friend and now closest rival, of driving that was “a little bit desperate”, after a battle at the Austrian GP.
articles.title: Austrian GP: Lando Norris fumes at Max Verstappen move

articles.description: Raducanu returns, Draper looks to pick up Murray's baton, and more key things to watch out for when Wimbledon starts on Monday.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 preview: Emma Raducanu, Andy Murray, Novak Djokovic and more to look out for

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from England vs Slovakia in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: England vs Slovakia LIVE: Euro 2024 Team news, kick-off time & latest updates

articles.description: Tadej Pogacar moves into the leader's yellow jersey as France's Kevin Vauquelin wins stage two of the Tour de France.
articles.title: Tour de France 2024: Tadej Pogacar takes yellow jersey

articles.description: At half-time in England's game against Slovakia there were "Iceland vibes" and, even at the end, "Sweet Caroline didn't sound very sweet" - but the Three Lions are in a fourth quarter-final in a row under Gareth Southgate.
articles.title: England beat Slovakia 2-1: From 'Iceland vibes' to 'get-out-of-jail-free card'

articles.description: Defending men's champion Carlos Alcaraz opens play on Centre Court when Wimbledon starts on Monday, with Emma Raducanu and Coco Gauff following.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2024 order of play: Carlos Alcaraz, Emma Raducanu & Coco Gauff on Centre Court

articles.description: Dina Asher-Smith wins the 200m title at the UK Athletics Championships to confirm her place at the Paris Olympic Games, while 17-year-old Phoebe Gill wins the 800m final.
articles.title: UK Athletics Championships 2024: Dina Asher-Smith reaches Olympics as young GB stars shine

articles.description: Watch England fans erupt at a fanpark in Wembley as Jude Bellingham scores a late stunner to send the game to extra time against Slovakia in the Euro 2024 last-16 match in Gelsenkirchen.
articles.title: Euro 2024: England fans go wild as Jude Bellingham scores late leveller
